goal.en: Provide students with fundamental knowledge and abilities to address problems related to the stability of fluid flow.
goal.ch: 提供學生解決與流體流動穩定性相關問題的基礎知識及能力。

content.en:
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Stability and Bifurcation
Week 3-4 Kelvin-Helmholtz instability
Week 5 Capillary instability
Week 6 Nonlinear Thermal convection
Week 7 Global instability
Week 8 Centrifugal instability
Week 9 Stability of Parallel flow
Week 10 Squire’s transformation, Squire equation, Rayleigh equation
Week 11 Necessary and sufficient condition for stability, numerical solution
Week 12 Numerical solution
Week 13 Destabilizing role of viscosity
Week 14 Linearized initial value problem
Week 15 Convective and absolution instability
Week 16 Parabolized stability equations
Week 17-18 Final project presentation
